Texts.Chs: 一只猩猩走进一家酒吧..。
Texts.Eng: An ape walks into a bar...

Texts.Chs: 尽管这些可怜的门扇动着，但它们永远飞不起来。
Texts.Eng: For all its flapping, these poor doors will never fly.

Texts.Chs: 在穿过这样的门口之前，你必须准备好决斗。
Texts.Eng: One must be prepared for a duel before crossing a doorway such as this.

Texts.Chs: 用叶族人的的的方式做一些愚愚愚蠢的事情。
Texts.Eng: Ssstupid ssswinging thing in Floran'sss way.

Texts.Chs: 穿过这到门之前，你最好做好一切准备。
Texts.Eng: Steppin' through one o' these, you'd best be ready for anything.

Texts.Chs: 摇摆的沙龙门，把那些讨厌的风滚草挡在外面。
Texts.Eng: Swinging saloon doors to keep those pesky tumbleweeds outside.

Texts.Chs: 这些门似乎只是一个戏剧性的信号，表明有人已经进入。
Texts.Eng: These 'doors' seem to function only as a dramatic signal that someone has entered.

Texts.Chs: 这些窗户几乎比门更好。
Texts.Eng: These would very nearly make better windows than doors.
